name: Your Own Reality
summary: First person game based on making decisions. During gameplay you will have to choose between good and evil. Every decision will change your story which may not be as easy as you think. Only you can decide which way to go. On your way you will meet many people who will try to provoke you, but it's up to you whether you keep cool or make the wrong decision under pressure. Some decisions are really hard but there's no escape.

videos.title: Your Own Reality - Early access trailer
